chunks.text: Hi everyone, I am Harshit Rehan and I am working at Atlassian as a software engineer.
And I have judged 10 plus hackathons and have taken almost 15 plus interviews.
And from both the experiences, I came to know that AI-powered projects are getting a lot of importance.
If the teams and students have introduced AI in their projects,
then they get a lot of good marks in innovation.
And if AI-powered projects are mentioned in your resume,
then the chances of being selected in the placement interviews in the resume increases.
And this is because AI is not just a bus word or a trend,
but its real world impact is amazing.
So in today's time, it can be a wrong decision for you not to include AI in your projects.
And you can be behind those 95% children who are taking advantage of this trend
and are also performing very well in their placements and hackathons.
But it is not the case that you have used any of your AI in your projects.
This will only make the AI's impact amazing when artificial intelligence can better solve your project's problem statement.
And that is why in today's video, we will discuss 5 AI project ideas
which are innovative and with the help of AI, we can better solve those project problem statements.
Okay? So without much wait, let's get started.
Before discussing the ideas of AI projects, I want to tell you about the importance of AI.
Because today, a lot of people think that only chat GPT is AI or AI is only hype.
Actually, AI will come in the future. But it is not like that.
Neither is it just chat GPT AI nor is AI coming in the future.
AI is present in almost every industry and is being used heavily.
Tesla's self-driving cars which are doing the transportation revolution are AI-powered.
There are robotic surgeons in healthcare who perform precise surgeries.
They are also AI-powered.
There are voice assistants in our homes like Siri, Alexa etc.
who listen to our talks and also give a response according to us.
They are also AI-powered.
We watch movies and videos on Netflix, Amazon, YouTube and after that, the same movie and video is suggested
which we actually wanted to see.
All of these are amazing of AI and not just this.
AI is being used in almost every industry these days.
Healthcare, Finance, Retail, Entertainment, Education.
You can take the name of any industry and AI will definitely be used there.
It will also show a great impact.
According to reports, AI industry can grow to almost $1.8 trillion by 2030.
This will transform our industry in every sector in every way.
It will drive innovation into AI.
If you want to become a part of this revolution, then you have to contribute in the field of AI
and start building from today.
So, let's talk about our first AI project idea.
And that is AI-powered Resume Screening System.
We all know that companies go to thousands of resumes on each application.
It is very difficult to filter out the best candidates.
You might say that it is an ATS but ATS relies heavily on keyword matching.
If the exact keyword you want to search for is not in your resume, then ATS will reject your resume.
And along with that, ATS can only read some formats.
If you give a complex format in front of ATS or give a different format file to ATS,
which he doesn't know, then ATS will not be able to read that particular resume and reject the resume.
This will make many good candidates reject every year.
And instead, if you use AI-powered Resume Screening Tool,
then that tool will be able to understand the context of your resume with the help of natural language processing
and your skills and experiences will be able to be recognized well.
Even if they are written in a different way.
So now how to make this tool?
To make this tool, you will need a lot of resumes' data set.
In which you will add a label of Hired and Not Hired and train your ML model with the help of that.
To make this tool, you will need a library, those would be Spacey and Skykit Learn.
With the help of Spacey, you will be able to extract key features of it and with the help of Skykit Learn, you can classify those features.
Then after that you will have to build a dashboard in which we will display shortlisted resumes.
You can build this dashboard using Flask and Jambook.
By making this tool, you will automate many tedious tasks.
Which will help a lot in HR and recruitment.
Now coming to our second idea and that is Smart Traffic Management System.
Nowadays almost every city deals with traffic congestion.
And AI can present a very good solution for this.
For example, you can use computer vision to analyze live traffic feeds.
And on the basis of that, you can optimize signal timings,
optimize routes,
can reduce better routes and many more amazing things.
Because of which, you will reduce traffic only.
And along with that, your project's social impact will also become amazing.
Now how to build this project?
For that, you will have to integrate a live camera feed into your program.
Then you will use object detection models like YOLO.
To count number of objects, number of vehicles etc.
And on the basis of that, you will predict traffic congestion,
optimize signal timings,
suggest better routes etc.
Then after finally making this project,
you will deploy this project on devices like Raspberry Pi for real world use.
This project addresses urban challenges,
is a part of smart state initiatives and is also quite scalable.
Because of which, the usability and impact of this project is quite amazing.
And that's why you should definitely try this project.
Now coming to our third idea.
And that is AI powered fitness trainer.
Nowadays, almost everyone is quite conscious about their health and fitness.
And more than 70% of the people go to gym and work out.
But even today, many people don't have access to right fitness training.
And if they have access,
then no one will give them feedback about their mistakes.
In this case, if you make a virtual coach,
which according to every person's poly type,
suggests workout, monitors their workout form,
and also gives them real time feedback.
Then this will be a game changer and your project will be quite impactful.
To make this project, you will have to use pose estimation libraries.
Like media pipe and open pose etc.
With which you can track body movements.
Then after that you will have to train your model,
so that they can detect a poster and give you actionable feedback on its basis.
Then finally you can make a mobile app,
so that you can interact with the user.
With the help of this project, you will be able to do AI roles in healthcare and fitness.
Which is a growing industry and this will be a plus point for your project.
Now coming to our fourth idea,
and that is smart circular economy marketplace.
Circular economy focuses on reducing waste by reusing, repairing and recycling products.
And since waste management is quite important for sustainability,
then your project will be socially impactful.
In your project, you can make an AI-powered platform,
which will connect users, businesses, manufacturers,
and connect all these to use goods, repairing services and recycling materials.
With which we can make a zero waste ecosystem.
To make this project, you will have to analyze a particular product and predict its life cycle.
Then on the basis of that life cycle, you will have to make a dynamic pricing for that product.
And on the basis of that pricing, you will connect users with nearby shops, facilities and buyers.
For life cycle analysis, you will first use computer vision models like PyTorch and TensorFlow.
With which you will analyze the uploaded images of a particular product.
And then you will use predictive analysis to extract the remaining lifetime of the product.
Then you will have to make a dynamic pricing model,
in which you will use regression algorithms to extract the fair price of that particular product.
Which will be based on that product's condition, age and market demand.
And then finally, you will have to make a recommendation engine,
in which you will connect users with market, facilities and buyers.
This recommendation system will be based on geolocation.
In this, you will use geolocation for getting proximity based suggestions.
This project idea is quite unique and also promotes sustainability.
Because of which, it becomes the best project for getting attention in your hackathons,
job portfolios and your college life.
Now coming to our fifth and last idea, and that is AI powered disaster prediction system.
Natural disasters like floods, earthquakes, hurricanes etc.
All these create a lot of damage and cause a lot of loss.
If we have an AI system that predicts disasters and alerts people,
then we can save a lot of lives and at the same time minimize our losses.
To make this project, we will have to follow three steps.
Data collection, model training and visualization.
For data collection, you can use open source data sets from organizations like NASA, Kaggle etc.
In this data, there will be weather patterns, seismic activity and water levels.
Then in model training, you can use time series forecasting models like LSTMs and profit
so that you can predict disasters first.
For floods etc., you will have to integrate IoT devices for gathering real time water level data.
Then finally, in visualization, you will have to create dashboards on power BI and tab view
so that you can easily monitor these risks.
Due to this project, you will help the government organizations in preparing for disasters,
saving lives and reducing losses.
So, this project's social impact will be amazing.
You have to try this project.
So, these were the five most important AI project ideas.
If you make them, then your chances of selection in interviews and hackathons will increase.
So, I hope you could learn something from today's video.
And that's all from my side.
This is Harshit Rayan signing off.
Take care everyone.
And I will see you in the next video.
Till then, keep preparing and be focused.
